Yes! Crash Bandicoot is a long-running franchise that started in 1996.

The first game in the series, "Crash Bandicoot," was released on PlayStation and was a hit among gamers. The game followed the adventures of a bandicoot named Crash and his nemesis, the evil Doctor Nitrus Brio.

In 1998, a sequel, "Crash Bandicoot 2: Cortex Strikes Back," was released. The game continued the storyline from the first game and introduced new characters, including Coco, Crunch, and N. Gin.

In 2001, "Crash Bandicoot: Warped" was released. The game featured different gameplay elements than the previous two games, including time-trial levels and a multiplayer mode.
